reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: not sure if we were impressed by this hotel because we'd been driving all day and were suffering the effects of lingering hangovers. centrally located, fairly decent restaurant on ground floor serving a variety of international dishes (avoid the thai options). the room was a tad small but modern and comfortable. short walk to the unesco wooden old town which i'm gathering is the only reason (us) tourists come to this town? breakfast smaller than usual finnish spreads but more than sufficient by anyone elses standards.
reviews.title: Not bad

reviews.text: This hotel is located on walking distance of old Rauma, a Unesco listed town of wooden houses. The hotel does not look very attractive from the outside, but is a 'value for money' place to stay.
reviews.title: Newly decorated rooms
